verses.text: \w Now|strong="G1161"\w* as \w touching|strong="G4012"\w* things offered unto \w idols|strong="G1494"\w*, we \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w we|strong="G2192"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w knowledge|strong="G1108"\w*. \w Knowledge|strong="G1108"\w* puffeth \w up|strong="G5448"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w charity|strong="G0026"\w* \w edifieth|strong="G3618"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* any \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w think|strong="G1380"\w* that he \w knoweth|strong="G1492"\w* any \w thing|strong="G5100"\w*, he \w knoweth|strong="G1097"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w* \w yet|strong="G3764"\w* \w as|strong="G2531"\w* he \w ought|strong="G1163"\w* to \w know|strong="G1097"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* any \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w love|strong="G0025"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, the \w same|strong="G3778"\w* is \w known|strong="G1097"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

As \w concerning|strong="G4012"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* the \w eating|strong="G1035"\w* of those things that are offered in sacrifice unto \w idols|strong="G1494"\w*, we \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* an \w idol|strong="G1497"\w* \add is\add* \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w world|strong="G2889"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \add there is\add* \w none|strong="G3762"\w* \w other|strong="G2087"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w but|strong="G1487"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w though|strong="G1512"\w* there \w be|strong="G1526"\w* that are \w called|strong="G3004"\w* \w gods|strong="G2316"\w*, \w whether|strong="G1535"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w* \w or|strong="G1535"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, (\w as|strong="G5618"\w* there \w be|strong="G1526"\w* \w gods|strong="G2316"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w lords|strong="G2962"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w*,)

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* to \w us|strong="G2254"\w* \add there is but\add* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, the \w Father|strong="G3962"\w*, \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \add are\add* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \add are\add* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Howbeit|strong="G0235"\w* \add there is\add* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* every \w man|strong="G3956"\w* that \w knowledge|strong="G1108"\w*: \w for|strong="G1161"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* with \w conscience|strong="G4893"\w* of the \w idol|strong="G1497"\w* \w unto|strong="G2193"\w* this \w hour|strong="G0737"\w* \w eat|strong="G2068"\w* \add it\add* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* a thing offered unto an \w idol|strong="G1494"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w conscience|strong="G4893"\w* \w being|strong="G5607"\w* \w weak|strong="G0772"\w* is \w defiled|strong="G3435"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w meat|strong="G1033"\w* \w commendeth|strong="G3936"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* to \w God|strong="G2316"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w neither|strong="G3777"\w*, \w if|strong="G1437"\w* we \w eat|strong="G5315"\w*, are we the \w better|strong="G4052"\w*; \w neither|strong="G3777"\w*, \w if|strong="G1437"\w* we \w eat|strong="G5315"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*, are we the \w worse|strong="G5302"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* take \w heed|strong="G0991"\w* lest by any \w means|strong="G3381"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w liberty|strong="G1849"\w* of \w yours|strong="G5216"\w* \w become|strong="G1096"\w* a \w stumblingblock|strong="G4348"\w* to \w them|strong="G3588"\w* that are \w weak|strong="G0770"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* any \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w see|strong="G1492"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w* which \w hast|strong="G2192"\w* \w knowledge|strong="G1108"\w* sit at \w meat|strong="G2621"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w idolâ€™s temple|strong="G1493"\w*, \w shall|strong="G3618"\w* \w not|strong="G3780"\w* the \w conscience|strong="G4893"\w* of \w him|strong="G0846"\w* which \w is|strong="G5607"\w* \w weak|strong="G0772"\w* be \w emboldened|strong="G3618"\w* to \w eat|strong="G2068"\w* those things which are offered to \w idols|strong="G1494"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w through|strong="G1909"\w* \w thy|strong="G4674"\w* \w knowledge|strong="G1108"\w* \w shall|strong="G0622"\w* the \w weak|strong="G0770"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w* \w perish|strong="G0622"\w*, \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w died|strong="G0599"\w*?

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* when ye \w sin|strong="G0264"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w against|strong="G1519"\w* the \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w wound|strong="G5180"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w weak|strong="G0770"\w* \w conscience|strong="G4893"\w*, ye \w sin|strong="G0264"\w* \w against|strong="G1519"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G1355"\w*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w meat|strong="G1033"\w* \w make|strong="G4624"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w* to \w offend|strong="G4624"\w*, I will \w eat|strong="G5315"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w flesh|strong="G2907"\w* \w while|strong="G1519"\w* the world \w standeth|strong="G0165"\w*, \w lest|strong="G3361"\w* I \w make|strong="G4624"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w offend|strong="G4624"\w*.
